text: Kwavija tumtanga ija yalongile, “Sang'hano ya kubwelezela si yenu mweye, ila yangu nie, noliha,”10:30 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha NG'HUMBUKILA YA TOLATI 32:35. na vivija ilongigwa, “Mndewa kowatagusa wanhu zake.”10:30 Mbuli zino zolawa mkitabu cha NG'HUMBUKILA YA TOLATI 32:36; ZABULI 135:14.
